/2020/06/01/us/floyd-protests-live.html,"Police Clear Protesters With Tear Gas So Trump Can Pose by ChurchPresident Trump said violent protests over George Floyd’s death were “acts of domestic terror” and threatened to deploy the military to stop them.Competing autopsies, one by a government agency and one by doctors working with Mr. Floyd’s family, varied over the specific causes of his death.Protests descended into chaos in several major U.S. cities since the death of Mr. Floyd last week in Minneapolis. Here’s the latest.",,20200602-0000

/2020/06/01/business/stores-protests-damage.html,"Retailers, Battered by Pandemic, Now Confront ProtestsEven as major chains boarded up stores and halted operations, they largely sought to convey empathy for demonstrators and did not condemn the damage to their businesses.",,20200602-0000
